name: Blog
description: Technical blog system. Write articles in Markdown format with category and tag classification features. Only administrators can create, edit, and delete articles. ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration) regenerates the article list every hour.
architecture: Implements CRUD operations with Next.js App Router + Server Actions. Manages many-to-many relationships for Post, Category, and Tag with Prisma (Comment model is defined but UI not implemented). Renders Markdown with react-markdown and remark-gfm. Caches article list and categories with Next.js unstable_cache, invalidates cache with revalidateTag/revalidatePath. Regenerates article list page every hour with ISR (revalidate: 3600). Generates static pages for all articles at build time with generateStaticParams. Implements admin permission checks (session.user.role === 'admin') in Server Actions.
features: Article writing in Markdown format (react-markdown + remark-gfm)
Article classification by category and tags (many-to-many relationships)
Article creation, editing, and deletion by administrators (via FormData)
Fast article list display with caching (unstable_cache)
Automatic regeneration every hour with ISR
Publication and update date display (formatted in Japanese with date-fns)
